NHydras:

"That could be amenace... or an ally"muttered Hydras "What're you 
expecting you?... Repair him in order he can clear it what's going 
on!"

And looked to Quickstrike, Hydras said "Rust Plage almost killed me 
when a half of me was MEgatron... this plague attack every metal but 
prefers destroy first bots..."
